calipy.core (overview)Â¶

The orchestration layer: Nodes, NodeStructures, and everything else central to making calipy actually run.

calipy.core.base

This module provides the CalipyProbModel base class that is useful for representing, modifying, analyzing, and optimizing instrument models based on observed data.

calipy.core.components

Created on Thu Apr 25 10:44:42 2024

calipy.core.data

This module provides basic functionality to represent and access data in a way that interacts well with calipy's basic classes and methods.

calipy.core.effects

This module provides the CalipyEffect base class that is used for specifying random and deterministic phenomena affecting measurements and provides a list of basic effects as well as the functionality needed to integrate them into the CalipyProbModel class for simulation and inference.

calipy.core.funs

This module provides basic functionality to produce and adapt functions that interact well with calipy's CalipyTensor and CalipyDistribution classes and maintain dimension-awareness.

calipy.core.instruments

This module provides the CalipyInstrument base class that is useful for representing, modifying, analyzing, and optimizing instrument models.

calipy.core.primitives

This module provides primitives needed for performing basic probabilistic actions like declaring parameters and smapling distributions

calipy.core.tensor

This module provides basic dimension aware tensor functionality needed for subsampling, indexing, attaching dimensions to tensors and other quality of life features that allow tensors to keep and communicate extra structure.

calipy.core.utils

This module provides support functionality related to logging, data organization, preprocessing and other functions not directly related to calipy core domains.
